name: yl-project
description: 全栈项目 Docker 管理

scripts.help: echo 查看 DOCKER.md 获取完整命令说明
scripts.dev: npm run load-env -- node scripts/docker-compose-cross-platform.js -f docker-compose.dev.yml up
scripts.dev:up: npm run load-env -- node scripts/docker-compose-cross-platform.js -f docker-compose.dev.yml up -d
scripts.dev:restart: npm run load-env -- node scripts/docker-compose-cross-platform.js -f docker-compose.dev.yml restart
scripts.backend:start: npm run load-env -- node scripts/docker-compose-cross-platform.js -f docker-compose.dev.yml up -d backend
scripts.backend:restart: npm run load-env -- node scripts/docker-compose-cross-platform.js -f docker-compose.dev.yml restart backend
scripts.backend:shell: node scripts/docker-compose-cross-platform.js -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec backend sh
scripts.backend:init-db: npm run load-env -- node scripts/docker-compose-cross-platform.js -f docker-compose.dev.yml run --rm backend npm run db:init
scripts.mysql:fix-access: npm run load-env -- node scripts/docker-compose-cross-platform.js -f docker-compose.dev.yml run --rm backend node database/fix-external-access.js
scripts.web:shell: node scripts/docker-compose-cross-platform.js -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec web sh
scripts.mysql:start: npm run load-env -- node scripts/docker-compose-cross-platform.js -f docker-compose.dev.yml up -d mysql
scripts.deploy:manual: echo 请手动执行: git pull && docker compose -f docker-compose.prod.yml up -d --build
scripts.deploy:backend:manual: echo 请手动执行: git pull && docker compose -f docker-compose.prod.yml build backend && docker compose -f docker-compose.prod.yml up -d --no-deps backend
scripts.deploy:web:manual: echo 请手动执行: git pull && docker compose -f docker-compose.prod.yml build web && docker compose -f docker-compose.prod.yml up -d --no-deps web
scripts.verify: npm run health && npm run ps
scripts.reset:all: node scripts/docker-compose-cross-platform.js -f docker-compose.dev.yml down -v && docker volume rm yl_mysql_data 2>$null || docker volume rm yl_mysql_data || echo '数据卷已删除或不存在'
scripts.docs:dev:manual: echo 请手动执行: cd docs && npx vitepress dev
scripts.docs:build:manual: echo 请手动执行: cd docs && npx vitepress build
scripts.docs:preview:manual: echo 请手动执行: cd docs && npx vitepress preview
